Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and expectations. This product holds significant value for you, worth $10000 to you, and we believe it's an exceptional opportunity for you to invest in its benefits. Considering its quality and the impact it can have on your life or business, I am extending this exclusive offer to you at a special price of $9500. This is a limited-time offer, so I encourage you to consider it carefully. If you're interested or have any questions, please let me know immediately. We're looking forward to serving you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
